title: How to Make Artificial Maple Syrup at Home

steps.headline: Place a saucepan onto the stove and turn the heat on to low until water is added.
Pour the two sugars, brown and granulated, into the pan and mix, make sure it doesn't burn.
Pour the water, carefully, into the pan and add the salt.
Mix the mixture and achieve a boil.
Remove the saucepan from the heat and finally add the maple extract.
Let the maple syrup cool, plus store in an airtight container.

text: Place a saucepan onto the stove and turn the heat on to low until water is added.  Pour the two sugars, brown and granulated, into the pan and mix, make sure it doesn't burn.  Pour the water, carefully, into the pan and add the salt.  Mix the mixture and achieve a boil.  Remove the saucepan from the heat and finally add the maple extract.  Let the maple syrup cool, plus store in an airtight container.
